description: This file defines a ViewModelFactory class which provides instances of ViewModels, specifically for Android applications. It implements a factory pattern to create ViewModel instances with application context, notably creating a NotesViewModel when requested.

classes.name: ViewModelFactory
classes.description: A factory class for creating ViewModel instances with Application context, particularly to instantiate NotesViewModel.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates and returns an instance of a ViewModel class, specifically handling the creation of NotesViewModel with application context.
